com.mycompany.pewpewgame.controllers

Class EnemyController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mycompany.pewpewgame.controllers.EnemyController

  • public class EnemyController
extends Object
    The EnemyController handles the Enemy GameObjects, spawning and destroying them.
    Author:
    max

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EnemyController(GameController gc)
      Starts a thread for spawning enemies every x seconds.

    • Method Detail

      • spawnEnemy

        public void spawnEnemy()
        Spawns an Enemy object at the next spawnpoint in the list. It is not random, but unpredictable enough.

      • damageEnemy

        public void damageEnemy(GameObject e)
        This method damages a given GameObject, decreasing its hp attribute by 1.
        Parameters:
        e - given GameObject.
